localize.text: It’s time to talk about the second truth.
How much do you know about the company?
I’ve met many a manager in my time.
I have seen how the company exploited them.
Did they tell you that you’re special?
Covering your eyes and ears with lies, saying that you’re remarkable and resourceful, and that’s why you were hired?
It’s a company that everyone wants to work for.
Harvesting energy is only half the business.
Of course, every Wing is more than they appear.
But this company runs deeper than one might expect.
There was a time when everyone worked hard for the same goal.
But we lost integrity at some point.
What the company gives you is not a gift. You’re hired not because you’re a remarkable person.
